item.dc:creator: Daniel Adams
item.description:
Inspired by our previous release, working with Copilot Chat on GitHub has become even more seamless. You can instantly preview HTML files, edit files you’ve created, and work on issues…

The post Instant previews, flexible editing, and working with issues in Copilot available in public preview appeared first on The GitHub Blog.
